Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Today people across Australia are buzzing about the National Cabinet meeting in Brisbane. While the primary focus is on healthcare issues such as overhauling the Medicare system and addressing hospital overcrowding other topics are also under discussion including climate resilience measures for outer suburbs. The Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander legal sector is also making headlines as it pushes for additional funding to assist with the growing demand for legal aid. Additionally there is much excitement over the release of Netflix's Diplomat series a highly anticipated political drama created by the same team behind The West Wing. Overall Australians are keeping their fingers on the pulse of current events and looking forward to what the future will bring.
